root.name: Realm of the Titans
root.description: Realm of the Titans was originally released for the Chinese market on October 30th, 2010. Alpha and testing of an English localization has been underway since early 2011.Gameplay FeaturesRealm of the Titans features the standard Defense of the Ancients formula where two teams battle each other alongside waves of NPCs. As players kill NPCs or other players they gain gold and experience, which can be used to upgrade their character."Deny" tactic - Realm of the Titans employs a unique feature that lets players deny each other from earning experience and gold.Strategy Control Points - Players can control certain points of the map to spawn new waves of NPCs against the opposing team.Bot-synched Matchmaking - Whenever players leave a game before it ends or disconnects they are replaced with a bot.
